doc:
Kathy Shower https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kathy_Shower 0 Kathleen Ann Shower (born March 8, 1953 as Kathleen Ann Schrauer) is an American model and actress. Known as Kathy Shower she is Playboy's Playmate of the Month for May 1985 and Playmate of the Year for 1986. At the time of her first appearance, she was the oldest woman ever to appear as a Playboy Playmate, at age 33 as well as a single mother of two. Kathleen_Ann_Shower ( born March_8_,_1953 as Kathleen_Ann_Schrauer ) is an_American_model_and_actress . Known as Kathy_Shower she is Playboy 's_Playmate of the_Month for May_1985 and Playmate of the_Year for 1986 . At the_time of her_first_appearance , she was the_oldest_woman ever to_appear as a_Playboy_Playmate , at age_33 as_well as a_single_mother of two .
